title: Use your own coffee cup
description: By using your own coffee cup, you will reduce your CO2 emissions by a total of 0.08 kg.

title: No meat day
description: By not eating meat a day, you will reduce your carbon dioxide emissions by 0.86 kg.

title: Tap water instead of bottled water
description: By drinking tap water instead of bottled water, you will reduce your CO2 emissions by 0.2 kg.

title: No soda, tea, or sports drinks
description: Avoiding bottled soda, tea, and sports drinks will reduce your CO2 emissions by 0.42 kg.

title: Save your leftovers
description: By saving your leftovers and creating a new meal with them, you will reduce your CO2 emissions by 0.05 kg.

title: Walk or bike
description: By not driving just one day, you will reduce your CO2 emissions by 11.82 kg.

title: Carpooling
description: By carpooling just one day, you will reduce your CO2 emissions by 11.82 kg.

title: Lowriding
description: If you or your driver follow smart-driving tips, CO2 emissions will be reduced by 2.03 kg.

title: Avoid drive-thrus and park your car
description: Avoiding drive-thrus for food will reduce your CO2 emissions by 0.08 kg.

title: Turn off your car whenever possible.
description: Eliminating 5 minutes of engine idle time will reduce your CO2 emissions by 0.41 kg.

title: Make the purchase online instead of driving to the store
description: Shifting one purchase to online and avoiding a car trip to the store will reduce your CO2 emissions by 3.36 kg.

title: Walking up the stairs instead of taking an elevator
description: By walking up the stairs instead of taking an elevator, you will reduce your CO2 emissions by 0.06 kg.

title: Taking public transportation instead of driving
description: By choosing to take the public transportation instead of driving, you will reduce your CO2 emissions by 11.82 kg.

title: Turn off the lights
description: Killing un-needed lights in one room will reduce CO2 emissions by 0.55 kg.

title: Close windows in winter
description: By keeping chilly air from seeping in, you'll eliminate 0.94 kg of CO2 emissions.

title: Turn AC up by two degrees
description: Cutting back on your air conditioning just a little bit will reduce your CO2 emissions by 0.05 kg.

title: Give up paper towels
description: Eliminating your use of paper towels will reduce CO2 emissions by 0.09 kg.

title: Cold water for your laundry
description: By washing more of your laundry in cold water, you will reduce your CO2 emissions by 13.82 kg.

title: Line-dry a laundry load
description: By line-drying a laundry load, you will reduce your CO2 emissions by 2.14 kg.

title: Compost kitchen waste
description: Composting part of your daily garbage will reduce CO2 emissions equal to1.95 kg of CO2.

title: Reduce shower time
description: Reducing your shower from 8 minutes will reduce CO2 emissions by 1 kg.

title: Donate used clothing
description: Selling or donating one item of clothing you don't need can reduce CO2 emissions by 9.95 kg.

title: Hand dishwash
description: By hand dishwashing instead of using the electric dishwasher, you will reduce CO2 emissions by 6.49 kg.

title: Pack waste-free lunch
description: By packing waste-free lunche, you will reduce your CO2 emissions by 1.01 kg.

title: Cut paper consumption
description: By reducing your printing by 25%, you will reduce CO2 emissions by 0.69 kg.

title: Unplug your PC
description: By unplugging your PC each night, you will reduce your CO2 emissions by 0.77 kg.

title: Turn of lights
description: By turning of lights when leaving the office, you will reduce CO2 emissions by 0.55 kg.

title: Teleconference, Not Travel
description: By using video or and web teleconferencing tools instead of travelling, you will reduce CO2 emission by 11.82 kg.

title: Use recycled paper
description: By using recycled paper instead of non-recycled paper, you will reduce CO2 emissions by 0.05 kg.
